sections.body: During Combat The aristocrat mounts his horse and flees while shooting his crossbow. He orders his falcon to attack only if his foes seem weak or he is in mortal peril.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: The falconer has dedicated his life to training birds of prey—his raptors are his dearest friends. He cares little about courtly life and prefers the company of his noble birds.

name: Falconer
